channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache IoTDB Workbench
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache IoTDB Workbench

item.title: CVE-2023-24830|2023-03-08T16:15:25.489Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb%20workbench
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache IoTDB.This issue affects iotdb-web-workbench component: from 0.13.0 before 0.13.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-24829|2023-03-08T16:15:06.910Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb%20workbench
item.description:
Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache IoTDB.This issue affects the iotdb-web-workbench component from 0.13.0 before 0.13.3. iotdb-web-workbench is an optional component of IoTDB, providing a web console of the database.
This problem is fixed from version 0.13.3 of iotdb-web-workbench onwards.

item.title: CVE-2023-30771|2023-04-17T07:26:12.996Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb%20workbench
item.description:
Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache IoTDB.This issue affects the iotdb-web-workbench component on 0.13.3. iotdb-web-workbench is an optional component of IoTDB, providing a web console of the database.
This problem is fixed from version 0.13.4 of iotdb-web-workbench onwards.
